statements: SELECT * FROM Playlist ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT song_name, artist FROM Playlist WHERE artist = 'Ed Sheeran'
SELECT song_name, artist, album FROM Playlist WHERE duration > '00:03:30'
SELECT playlist_id, user_id, song_name FROM Playlist WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT DISTINCT artist FROM Playlist ORDER BY artist ASC
SELECT * FROM Playlist ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT song_name, artist, album FROM Playlist WHERE duration > INTERVAL '3 minutes'
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs FROM Playlist GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_songs DESC
SELECT playlist_id, user_id FROM Playlist WHERE artist LIKE 'J%' AND album = 'Best Hits'
SELECT playlist_id, song_name, duration FROM Playlist WHERE created_at > TIMESTAMP '2021-10-01 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT song_name, artist, duration_in_seconds FROM songs ORDER BY duration_in_seconds DESC;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE artist LIKE '%Taylor Swift%' ORDER BY song_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id = 2;
SELECT song_id, song_name, artist FROM songs WHERE duration_in_seconds > 180;
SELECT playlists.playlist_name, songs.song_name, songs.artist FROM playlists JOIN songs ON playlists.playlist_id = songs.playlist_id;
SELECT songs.song_name, songs.duration_in_seconds, playlists.playlist_name FROM songs LEFT JOIN playlists ON songs.playlist_id = playlists.playlist_id;
SELECT * FROM playlist;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlist ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM song WHERE length_minutes > 3;
SELECT playlist_id, COUNT(song_id) AS num_songs FROM playlist_song GROUP BY playlist_id;
SELECT song_title, artist FROM song WHERE artist='Taylor Swift';
SELECT * FROM playlist;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlist WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY playlist_name DESC;

SELECT playlist.playlist_name, song.song_title, song.artist FROM playlist INNER JOIN playlist_song ON playlist.playlist_id = playlist_song.playlist_id INNER JOIN song ON playlist_song.song_id = song.song_id ORDER BY playlist.playlist_name ASC, song.artist DESC;

SELECT playlist.playlist_name, COUNT(song.song_id) AS total_songs FROM playlist LEFT JOIN playlist_song ON playlist.playlist_id = playlist_song.playlist_id LEFT JOIN song ON playlist_song.song_id = song.song_id GROUP BY playlist.playlist_id HAVING total_songs > 5;

SELECT playlist.playlist_name, MAX(song.length_minutes) AS longest_song_length FROM playlist INNER JOIN playlist_song ON playlist.playlist_id = playlist_song.playlist_id INNER JOIN song ON playlist_song.song_id = song.song_id GROUP BY playlist.playlist_id ORDER BY longest_song_length DESC
SELECT id, user_id, playlist_name FROM playlists;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT id, song_name, artist_name FROM songs ORDER BY song_name ASC;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT playlist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_songs FROM playlists LEFT JOIN playlist_songs ON playlists.id = playlist_songs.playlist_id GROUP BY playlist_name ORDER BY total_songs DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY playlist_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT artist_name, genre, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > 180 ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT u.username, p.playlist_name, s.song_name FROM users u JOIN playlists p ON u.id = p.user_id JOIN playlist_songs ps ON p.id = ps.playlist_id JOIN songs s ON ps.song_id = s.id;
SELECT * FROM playlist;
SELECT playlist_id, user_id, playlist_name FROM playlist WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT playlist_name, COUNT(*) AS song_count FROM playlist_song INNER JOIN playlist ON playlist.playlist_id = playlist_song.playlist_id GROUP BY playlist_name;
SELECT user.username, playlist.playlist_name FROM user JOIN user_playlist ON user.user_id = user_playlist.user_id JOIN playlist ON playlist.playlist_id = user_playlist.playlist_id;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, duration FROM song WHERE artist_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlist;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlist WHERE playlist_id = '1234';
SELECT ps.playlist_id, s.song_name, s.artist_name FROM playlist_song ps JOIN song s ON ps.song_id = s.song_id;

SELECT u.username, p.playlist_name, s.song_name FROM user u JOIN user_playlist up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN playlist p ON up.playlist_id = p.playlist_id JOIN playlist_song ps ON p.playlist_id = ps.playlist_id JOIN song s ON ps.song_id = s.song_id;

SELECT DISTINCT u.username, p.playlist_name, s.song_name FROM user u JOIN user_playlist up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN playlist p ON up.playlist_id = p.playlist_id JOIN playlist_song ps ON p.playlist_id = ps.playlist_id JOIN song s ON ps.song_id = s.song_id;
